phi.description: Angle between source location in azimuth measured from +x axis counterclockwise, to +y axis, range 0 - 360 degrees [deg]

theta.description: Angle between source location and LAT boresight, range 0 - 180 [deg]

data_timescale.description: Binning (i.e. time sampling) of the count rate lightcurve used during the iterative location calculation phase of the processing [s]

grb_intensity_total.description: Subset of the total number of events in the standard 4 energy bands that were used in the location calculation [ct]

grb_intensity1.description: Number of events in the <0.1 GeV band [ct]

grb_intensity2.description: Number of events in the 0.1-1 GeV band [ct]

grb_intensity3.description: Number of events in the 1-10 GeV band [ct]

grb_intensity4.description: Number of events in the >10 GeV band [ct]

significance.description: Sqrt(TS) (with 2 DOF) of the detection [sqrt(TS) 2 DOF]

first_photon.description: Time of first photon used in the location calculation [ISO 8601]

last_photon.description: Time of last photon used in the location calculation [ISO 8601]
